page.title: 08FOOD
page.content:
{Foods bought from shops.}
Most food is home grown,in rural areas like{Chilsworthy,}but people still need shops.
The sort of thing you might find in these small village shops are sausages bacon,meat,fruit and vegetables.These small shops can all be put into one, called a "General Stores".This consists of one smallish shop which is a post office,sweet-shop,grocers,green -grocers and tobacconists.
Most families take a trip into town (in this case Holsworthy) and they buy everything thing they need.Orange squash and other drinks may be bought from these "General Stores".Most people prefer home grown meals. {by Lisa Smith and Louisa Herrero.
